name: Swamp Monsters
overview: Swamp Monsters is a top view game with the screen scrolling constantly from left to right as you drive a boat along a river killing as many Swamp Monsters as you can. You can move your boat up or down trying to hit the Swamp Monsters but you must avoid the sides of the river and mines and if you hit the sides or a mine then it is game over. There are two speeds that can be selected and they are Normal and Fast.
